snippet.title: The Palace on the Hill Trailer 2022
snippet.description:
Steam Page https://store.steampowered.com/app/1582600/The_Palace_on_the_Hill
Contact
DMs are open on Discord https://discord.gg/4QwKy2bN35, 
Twitter at https://twitter.com/palaceonhill , 
Email at mridul@nikugames.com 

What is this game?
The Palace on the Hill is a story based, open-world, adventure game. The story is about a teenage boy, Vir, set in a hillside village in India. Vir is an aspiring artist and creates art by exploring the ruins of an ancient kingdom in his village.
In his explorations, he discovers various things and stories told by the villagers which become references for his artworks.
Vir's father, a farmer, is struggling with debt due to failed crops and loses the savings meant for his son's college.
During the course of his summer vacation, Vir gets an exciting opportunity to showcase his artworks in a gallery which will earn him a lot of money.
To fulfil this quest Vir has to create a series of paintings depicting the royal history of their village.
Every player of this game will step into Vir's shoes and explore their village and its historical ruins, find puzzling references for paintings and discover lost legends from various people while also making new friends and doing fun activities.

Platforms
The game is being designed for PC, Mac, mobiles and consoles. The game will be first available on PC, Mac and later on mobile and consoles.

Timeline
Development on the game began in mid 2020 and expected release is mid to late 2022.

Team
There are 2 core developers working full time on the game. @mridul - nikugames is the programmer and designer, and @Mala - nikugames is the art director. Freelancers are occasionally hired for specific tasks. The team is based in India, at the city of Coimbatore in the state of Tamil Nadu.

Languages
The game will be released with support for English and Hindi (written in English script). In addition to these the 
developers know Punjabi, Tamil and Bengali languages and may include in the game at a later stage.
The game is designed for text and voice over is not supported at this time.
